page.title: 05Corams Fields: 05300182
page.content: Corams Fields is a very special park because they don't allow adults in without a child. They don't allow adults in because they may take children away and hurt them. This is a lovely park with a very big football pitch with astro turf all over it so if and when you fall you don't hurt yourself. Corams also have a big space to play in and there is a park for little ones to play with things such as swings with safety bars around them and little slides and horses that swing backwards and forewards. They also have a little village which is for under-fives. The little village has a sandpit, a waterpool and houses with little slides near them. They have another part for 10's to 16's. When you're 16 you're not allowed to come in without a child. They also have a pets corner for the 10's part.
